p.br: As I am sure you are aware, the governor announced today that school buildings will remain closed for the rest of the year; therefore, we will continue with online instruction until the last day of school, May 26. He had several reasons for doing this, with the main being that the virus is still among us. Keeping our students, staff, and community safe is our primary concern. As I have throughout this pandemic, I will continue to update you.
